      • calculateKurtosisForAttribute

        public float calculateKurtosisForAttribute(int attType,
                                  int attIndex)
        Calculates the fourth standard moment of the provided feature distribution. It represents the steepness of the curve.
        Parameters:
        attType - Integer value denoting attribute type.
        attIndex - Index of the attribute in the DataSet definition for that type.
        Returns:
        Kurtosis of the specified attribute.
